mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `terabox`.`orders` (user_email, movie_reservation_index, product_index, price, user_card_mapping_index, quantity, created_at, total_price, total_sale) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{movieReservationIndex}, #{productIndex}, #{price}, #{userCardMappingIndex}, #{quantity}, #{createdAt}, #{totalPrice}, #{totalSale})
mapper.select: SELECT `orders`.`index` AS `index`, `orders`.`user_email` AS userEmail, `orders`.`movie_reservation_index` AS movieReservationIndex, `orders`.`product_index` AS productIndex, `orders`.`price` AS price, `orders`.`user_card_mapping_index` AS userCardMappingIndex, `orders`. `quantity` AS quantity, `orders`. `created_at` AS createdAt, `orders`.`total_price` AS totalPrice, `orders`.`total_sale` AS totalSale, `product`.`name` AS productName, `product`.`quantity` AS productQuantity FROM `terabox`.`orders` LEFT JOIN `terabox`.`products` AS `product` ON `orders`.`product_index` = `product`.`index` WHERE BINARY `user_email` = #{userEmail}
